entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6.
